text: today's dinner benefits from having

delish weights you see how easy it is
for today what you need to do is cut two
lemons in half all my prep is done I
mean the lemons go in a baking sheet and
then add those veg that you already
prepped four or five heads of fennel cut
into one-inch wedges one and a half
pounds of carrots peeled and cut into

like a lot for just tonight's dinner but
you're gonna save some of these
vegetables for later in the week
drizzle with oil 1 tablespoon if you're
feeling chubby 2 tablespoons of you're
feeling lean sprinkle with salt pepper
toss and then just make sure that
they're in as even of a layer as
possible and then you want to roast
these at 425 degrees for about 25
minutes and then you can get your pork
ready you need a 2 pound pork loin pork
loin is a very lean meat but it's
covered with a cap of fat this one's got
a very thick cap of fat so I'm gonna get
rid of some of it
I do like a little bit of fat on my pork
loin because it keeps it nice and moist
while it's roasting you can always take
it off after the fact but of course I
happen to like eating a little bit of

what you want to do is sprinkle with a

most even cooking you want to tie your

compact lay that's the idea you want

3 or 4 you know obviously a lot of times

you but you can tie your own with
butchers twine that you buy at the

that your pork loin cooks evenly
and then season with salt and pepper
nice and generously anything that gets

just move the vegetables aside pork
needs to cook until it's 138 degrees in

30 35 more minutes put your pork right
in the center and then back in the oven
for about 30 to 35 minutes when my pork
came out of the oven i tented it with
foil and now i'm just letting it rest
for a 10 or 15 minutes so the juices
recirculate and then it's time to eat
slice up your pork I like to slice mine
nice and thin remove the strings before

don't know whatever works for you use a
sharp knife I think that if you slice
the pork nice and thin it's the nicest
way to eat pork loin like this and try
try try try not to overcook it because
overcooked pork loin is really dry and
icky and perfectly cooked pork loin is
actually quite delicious okay it's all
